title: Finnish historical maps with sorvi R package
text: Accessing high-quality shapefiles vectorized geospatial location boundaries different administrative divisions nowadays trivial datasets readily available download services APIs. Packages geofi/ giscoR make easy draw maps case Finland European NUTS areas visualize statistical data form choropleth maps. However, comes historical boundaries Finnish municipality boundaries year 2013, drawing maps becomes harder. example, National Land Survey Finland offers municipality-based boundaries current year Statistics Finland offers maps 2013 onwards. 2005 2022 , Finnish municipalities undergone 79 merger processes number falling 431 309, approximately one-fourth. time series data municipality mergers taken account Statistics Authorities, making possible see current municipalities parts combined developed past. cases, Statistics Finland uses current municipality division basis population statistics time series.

title: Finnish historical maps with sorvi R package
text: 2003-2012 FinnONTO project driven Semantic Computing Research Group (SeCo) started ambition laying foundations “national metadata, ontology, ontology service, linked data framework Finland”. part project National Ontology Service ONKI published 2008, used publish “interlinked, collaboratively created ontologies vocabularies centralized way, 150 organizations registered users. part FinnONTO project, Finnish Spatio-Temporal Ontology (SAPO) created. SAPO “ontology time series Finnish municipalities time interval 1865-2010” ontology, “represents knowledge changes (e.g. merges, splits) historical regions (e.g. cities, counties)”. types changes include (Väätäinen & Kauppinen 2015, Finnish terms parentheses): establishing completely new municipality (perustaminen); abolishing municipality (lakkauttaminen); splitting one municipality two municipalities (jakaantuminen); merging two municipalities single municipality (yhdistyminen); changing ownership part municipality another (aluesiirto); changing name municipality (nimenmuutos); ceding municipality part municipality another sovereign state, effectively abolishing municipality entity original country (alueluovutus); integrating (opposite ceding territory) municipality another sovereign state, effectively meaning new administrative area must established receiving country (aluesaaminen); establishing new administrative area parts two areas (aluesiirtoperustaminen); dividing existing administrative area two existing administrative areas (aluesiirtojakaantuminen); renting certain area use another sovereign state (aluevuokraus); ending rental period land area returning sovereign rule (aluevuokrauksen loppuminen); formation, case administrative areas (settlements) gradually started exist without specific founding date (muodostuminen); demarcation, areas divided two neighbouring administrative areas didn’t previously clearly defined borders (rajanveto). practice, Finnish municipalities set establishment date. municipalities established 1865 Imperial Majesty’s Degree Municipal Administration Countryside (information Wikipedia (Finnish), degree AsK 4/1865 text Wikisource (Finnish)), moved secular administration away church parishes newly established municipalities. Many municipalities also changed names point, split merged, border changes neighbouring municipalities. Ceding abolishing municipalities mostly related situation Second World War many Finnish municipalities Karelia ceded Soviet Union. Since 2008, ONKI superseded Finto, although contain data ONKI . used data files (RDF/Turtle files) downloaded ONKI starting point created datasets feel natural R user use, using rdflib R package.

title: Finnish historical maps with sorvi R package
text: Historical maps can drawn simply using get_municipalities() function. municipalities can plotted base R functions ggplot2.  interesting mapping examples, recommend readers acquaintance e.g. geofi packages articles making maps, joining attribute data geospatial objects spatial data analysis. sorvi::kunnat1865_2021 dataset sorvi consists sf objects analogous recent objects downloaded geofi package.
code: library(sorvi) #> sorvi - Tools for Finnish Open Data. #> Copyright (C) 2010-2023 Leo Lahti, Juuso Parkkinen, Joona Lehtomaki and Pyry Kantanen  #>  #> http://github.com/ropengov/sorvi  #>  #>  Hard sciences are successful because they deal with soft problems;  #>  soft sciences are struggling because they deal with hard problems. #> -                        Von Foerster  x <- get_municipalities(year = 1912) head(x) #> Simple feature collection with 6 features and 8 fields #> Geometry type: POLYGON #> Dimension:     XY #> Bounding box:  xmin: 20.88007 ymin: 60.87673 xmax: 24.76896 ymax: 66.30193 #> Geodetic CRS:  ISN93 #> # A tibble: 6 × 9 #> # Groups:   kunta_nro [6] #>   x                kunta_nro kunta_name_fi kunta_name_sv startyear endyear  area #>   <chr>            <chr>     <chr>         <chr>             <dbl>   <int> <dbl> #> 1 http://www.yso.… 001       Ahlainen      Ahlainen           1908    1971  185  #> 2 http://www.yso.… 003       Akaa          Akaa               1895    1931  131  #> 3 http://www.yso.… 004       Alahärmä      Alahärmä           1867    2008  351. #> 4 http://www.yso.… 005       Alajärvi      Alajärvi           1868    2008  737. #> 5 http://www.yso.… 006       Alastaro      Alastaro           1869    2008  257. #> 6 http://www.yso.… 007       Alatornio     Nedertorneå        1865    1956  868  #> # ℹ 2 more variables: muutos_tyyppi <chr>, geometry <POLYGON [°]> plot(x) library(ggplot2) ggplot(x) + geom_sf()

title: Finnish historical maps with sorvi R package
text: can seen visualizations , gaps data. example, dataset metadata year 1912 shows 49 empty geometries: addition, inconsistencies geometries compared newer datasets downloaded National Land Survey Finland / Statistics Finland API. example, municipalities surrounded rural municipalities (“maalaiskunta”) can sometimes left rural municipality polygon rural municipality polygon simplified holes. Similarly, municipality enclaves exclaves might properly represented borders municipalities rather simplified. However, must noted small-scale information like essential drawing choropleth maps visualizing broad strokes municipality administration development Finland. Additionally, access historical maps mean much else done without access type data. Statistics Finland published data Finnish population 1750 onwards statistical database can accessed e.g. pxweb R package, regrettably, data national level. Publications Suomen Tilastollinen Vuosikirja (Finnish Statistical Yearbook, example 1918) might interesting sources information someone time resources digitize tables . Utilizing HisKi database contains digitized parish record data also interesting, although oldest parish records much older oldest municipalities. prompt need map parish district borders well-defined borders ever existed. therefore evident much work still done. Users welcome fill data gaps provide better polygons! Opening issue GitHub directly making pull request much appreciated. Suggestions regarding best possible practices solutions data metadata storage also welcome.

title: sorvi Tutorial
text: sorvi package includes 2 datasets: sorvi::kunnat1865_2021 listing municipalities existed years 1865-2021, sorvi::polygons1909_2009 contains polygons municipalities contained former dataset. Despite slightly misleading name, polygons dataset contains shapes municipalities 1800s well, municipalities borders remained relatively unchanged 2nd World War late 1900s-early 2000s municipality mergers. users definitely can use datasets directly work (improvements / additions / forks welcome!), included get_municipalities() function conveniently returning map Finland existed certain point time. simple example using get_municipalities() function drawing map containing Finnish municipalities 1931:  See sorvi article Finnish historical maps sorvi R package information examples.
code: library(ggplot2) map1931 <- get_municipalities(year = 1931) ggplot(map1931) + geom_sf()

title: Functions for Finnish Open Data
text: sorvi package originally intended hosting various algorithms Finnish open goverment data R. superseded later rOpenGov packages specialized scope (geofi, hetu pxweb), sorvi now found new life hosting various functions helpful rOpenGov package maintenance, authoring preparing presentations. Originally rOpenGov/sorvi fork juusohaapanen/soRvi-dev rOpenGov’s sorvi branch since taken life . fork detached fron juusohaapanen’s branch November 2021.

title: Functions for Finnish Open Data

title: Get CRAN download statistics — cran_downloads
text: Produces tibble visualization package download statistics.

title: Get CRAN download statistics — cran_downloads
code: cran_downloads(   pkgs = "all",   output = "tibble",   sum = "by_month",   plot.scale = 11,   use.cache = TRUE )

title: Get CRAN download statistics — cran_downloads
text: pkgs Package name(s). Default "", prints statistics rOpenGov packages. can also input 1 package names vector. output "tibble" (default) "plot". sum "by_month" "by_year" "plot" outputs line chart, "total" outputs bar chart. sum "by_month" (default), "by_year" "total" plot.scale integer, default 11. Smaller numbers decrease size plot elements, larger numbers make larger. use.cache Cache downloaded statistics. Default TRUE

title: Get CRAN download statistics — cran_downloads
text: tibble ggplot2 line chart bar chart

what: Get IFPI Finland music consumption statistics — get_ifpi_charts
title: Get IFPI Finland music consumption statistics — get_ifpi_charts
text: Download chart position data ifpi.fi

title: Get IFPI Finland music consumption statistics — get_ifpi_charts
code: get_ifpi_charts(channel = "radio", year = NA, week = NA)

title: Get IFPI Finland music consumption statistics — get_ifpi_charts
text: channel Options: "radio", "albumit", "singlet", "fyysiset-albumit" year year numeric. Default NA, returning charts current year. Charts available 2014 onwards. week week numeric. Default NA, returning last possible charts. Week current week. Please note number weeks differ years. simplicity's sake valid weeks set 1 53. Use e.g. `lubridate::isoweek` check many weeks given year .

title: Get IFPI Finland music consumption statistics — get_ifpi_charts
text: tibble

title: Get IFPI Finland music consumption statistics — get_ifpi_charts
text: Web scraping function inspired Sauravkaushik8 Kaushik's blog post "Beginner's Guide Web Scraping R" analyticsvidhya.com. Downloads chart data Musiikkituottajat - IFPI Finland ry website. Please note function works IFPI Finland website! output following columns: rank: Rank chart artist: Artist name song_title: Song title rank_last_week: Rank chart previous week. RE song re-entered chart chart_woc: Weeks chart week: Week number observation year: Year observation

title: Get IFPI Finland music consumption statistics — get_ifpi_charts
text: Pyry Kantanen <pyry.kantanen@gmail.com>

title: GitHub issues statistics — gh_issue_stats
text: Get statistics GitHub issues GitHub API.

title: GitHub issues statistics — gh_issue_stats
code: gh_issue_stats(   owner = "ropengov",   repo = "geofi",   issue.type = NA,   time.from = NA,   time.to = NA )

title: GitHub issues statistics — gh_issue_stats
text: owner Repository owner / organization. Default "ropengov" repo Repository name. Default "geofi" issue.type Type issues printed: "issue", "PR" NA printing (default). time.Start date ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ. Default "2010-09-01T00:00:00Z". time.End date ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ. Default Sys.time().

title: GitHub issues statistics — gh_issue_stats
text: tibble

title: GitHub issues statistics — gh_issue_stats
text: function intended easy information retrieval rOpenGov package issues pull requests. specifically, function returns tibble containing information issue id, title, status (open closed), number comments, opened , created, openers status (rOpenGov organization member, package contributor regular user opened e.g. bug issue) type issue. GitHub Issues API handles Pull Requests Issues similarly therefore function returns types default. Different types issues can filtered using issue.type parameter. Kudos function go Jennifer Bryan. changes made mostly related adding additional fields (opener_type, issue_type) output tibble writing function around original contributions. scope function mainly help rOpenGov team analyze type user feedback get via GitHub issues therefore scope function limited.

title: GitHub issues statistics — gh_issue_stats
text: Original scripts Jennifer Bryan (jennybc), function Pyry Kantanen <pyry.kantanen@gmail.com>

title: Municipality dataset — kunnat1865_2021
text: dataset containing information instance individual municipalities.

title: Municipality dataset — kunnat1865_2021
code: kunnat1865_2021

title: Municipality dataset — kunnat1865_2021
text: simple feature 1337 rows 10 variables: x Universal Resource Identifier (URI) municipality instance time. example: http://www.yso.fi/onto/sapo/Maalahti(1908-1972) kunta_nro Municipality code, unique number assigned municipality stays long municipality exists. example: "475" kunta_name_fi official name municipality Finnish. example: Maalahti kunta_name_fi official name municipality Swedish. example: Malax startyear Start year municipality instance, e.g. founding year. example: 1865 endyear End year municipality instance, can NA still valid. example: 1972 area Area municipality, square kilometers. example 185.00 muutos_kuvaus description change occurred beginning specific instance. example: "Ahlainen erotettiin Ulvilasta 1908" muutos_tyyppi Type change. example: "Jakaantuminen" muutos_tunniste Identifiers changes happened, can used link past future instances municipalities together. example: "Jakaantuminen1534, Jakaantuminen2"

title: Municipality dataset — kunnat1865_2021
text: Raw data downloaded ONKI.fi website 04 Aug 2022: http://onki.fi/en/browser/overview/sapo Data attribution: FinnONTO Consortium: https://seco.cs.aalto.fi/projects/finnonto/ Information abolished municipalities municipality name changes Statistics Finland website: Municipalities regional divisions based municipalities files classification publications

title: Municipality dataset — kunnat1865_2021
text: Finnish municipalities formed 1865 decree municipal governance country Asetus kunnallishallituksesta maalla 1865 dataset contains municipalities allegedly formed even . two instances "illegal municipalities" (Mustio Rutakko) recognized actual municipalities functioned late 1800s early 1900s.

title: sorvi 0.8.22 (2023-10-20)

title: sorvi 0.8.21 (2023-08-21)
text: Experimental new features package testing R functions datasets related mapping Finnish historical municipality maps: New experimental function: get_municipalities(), mapping historical Finnish municipalities. year argument can given filter correct selection municipalities given year. New experimental datasets: sorvi::kunnat1865_2021 sorvi::polygons1909_2009, containing needed data get_municipalities() function Raw data courtesy National Semantic Web Ontology Project Finland (FinnONTO), project Semantic Computing Research Group. Raw data downloaded Finnish Ontology Library Service ONKI (description SeCo website).
